name: Health Regeneration Charm I
description:
Health Regeneration Charms increase the rate at which health is restored when out of combat.

Fuse together 5 charms of the same level to obtain a charm of the next highest level.

Charms can be placed into items with sockets, but the total level of all of the charms cannot exceed the level of the item.
